meanings.definition: A mode of behavior or way of thought peculiar to an individual.
meanings.sent1: Her idiosyncrasies make her unique among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The town's idiosyncrasies include a love for quirky festivals.
meanings.sent3: His idiosyncrasies always lead to funny misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The idiosyncrasies of the old house whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The professor's idiosyncrasies were as colorful as his tie collection.

meanings.definition: A distinctive or peculiar feature or characteristic of a place or thing.
meanings.sent1: The idiosyncrasies of the antique shop drew in curious visitors.
meanings.sent2: The idiosyncrasies of the old clock made it a family heirloom.
meanings.sent3: The idiosyncrasies of the cat's meow always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The idiosyncrasies of the mountain range painted a breathtaking landscape.
meanings.sent5: The idiosyncrasies of the garden revealed the gardener's creativity.
